name: Fry Me To The Moon Trivia Game | Futurama | 10 Questions

questions.text: What year was Fry shoved into a freezing chamber?
questions.explanation:
1999/2000.

	Fry was a pizza delivery man for Panucci's Pizza who was tricked into going to the business where they froze him. He was woken up in 2999. He was pushed into the freezing chamber just as the clock struck midnight signaling the year 2000.

questions.text: By the series end, who had Fry married?
questions.explanation:
Leela.

	He had a crush on Leela, a one-eyed mutant, from the first episode of the series onward. They dated periodically, often with bad results during the main run of the series. After being cancelled and brought back the two paired off on a more permanent basis and eventually fell in love.

questions.text: What was the name of the delivery company Fry worked for during most of the series?
questions.explanation:
Planet Express.

	Once he was awoken in 2999, Fry got a job doing the only thing he knew how, making deliveries.  Instead of delivering pizzas, he joined the Planet Express crew and delivered little bits of everything all over the galaxy.

questions.text: In the series' second episode, where in the solar system did Fry travel to?
questions.explanation:
The Moon.

	Travelling from the Earth to the moon was no big deal to the rest of the crew, but for Fry he thought it was amazing. While on the moon for the first time, he visited the site of the first moon landing and went to a cheesy theme park.

questions.text: What was the name of Fry's son?
questions.explanation:
Yancy.

	Yancy Fry Sr. was both Philip Fry's father and son. During an episode where he time travelled he met his grandmother and sired his own father without knowing who she was at the time. Yancy Fry Jr. was his brother.

questions.text: Who provided the voice for the adult Fry for every episode of the series?
questions.explanation:
Billy West.

	Voice over legend Billy West provided Fry's and many other character's voices during the series. West has also provided voices for "Space Jam", "Ren & Stimpy", "Doug" and many other TV shows and movies. West is also the lead singer and songwriter for the band Billy West and The Grief Counselors.

questions.text: What college did Fry briefly attend before getting a job in the 20th century?
questions.explanation:
Coney Island Community College.

	Fry dropped out of Coney Island Community College before getting his job at Panucci's. Later in life, he attended a university on Mars and had a talking monkey for a roommate. He dropped out of Mars University as well.

questions.text: What type of animal did Fry have as a pet before being frozen?
questions.explanation:
Dog.

	His pet dog, Seymour, waited outside of Panucci's for him until he died after Fry was frozen. During season 4 of the show Fry found the fossilized version of Seymour and had him brought back to life, only for him to die again before the end of the episode.

questions.text: Who was Fry's robotic best friend?
questions.explanation:
Bender.

	Bender was voiced by John Dimaggio. Fry and Bender were portrayed as good friends, despite Bender technically not having any feelings. Bender drank beer to keep his insides lubricated, and at times had quite the vulgar streak when talking. Flexo was another bending unit, nearly identical in appearance to Bender, but he had a beard. Calculon was a robot actor, and the Robot Devil was, well the robot version of the devil.

questions.text: Fry often spoke about his love of "Star Wars" and Led Zeppelin while remembering his life in the 20th century.
questions.explanation:
False.

	While Fry often remembered his former life, he never mentioned "Star Wars" or that band. In one episode his record collection was shown, and no albums belonging to Led Zeppelin were in the collection that was shown.
